des: "Refreshing Mexican-style green sauce to put on tacos, enchiladas, or anything else you desire. A light, refreshing, and hot sauce that is perfect for summer time! Serrano chili peppers can be really hot. I use 1 to start with. If you want more heat, add additional peppers until your desired heat."
ins: Combine tomatillos, garlic, cilantro, avocado, serrano chile pepper, and salt in a blender; blend until smooth.
